sentences.sContent: As to whether MoUs recover, that depends on their mettle.
sentences.sContent_eng: As to whether MoUs recover, that depends on their mettle.
sentences.sCn: 至于宇宙主宰者能否复原，这取决于他们的勇气。

sentences.sContent: Now, everyone will be testing you, your mettle, your resolve.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now, everyone will be testing you, your mettle, your resolve.
sentences.sCn: 现在，每个人都会考验你，你的勇气、你的决心。

trans.tranOther: courage and determination to do something even when it is very difficult
